ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bombastic Bellow [ was: Dueling?]
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats on 55 Gael!  It will be a while since I join you there - been doing a lot of raids and other non-xp activities... Slyde ... From: Robert(Bob) Smith
ygData.messageBody:
Grats on 55 Gael! It will be a while since I join you there - been doing a
lot of raids and other non-xp activities...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Monday, April 23, 2001 9:46 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bombastic Bellow [ was: Dueling?]


> It is resisted a lot against PCs close in level to you because
> it is MR based. It has a 5-minute refresh time as well.
>
> Shada Iceheart [Retired]
> <Afterlife>
>

With that said, however, it is not all that bad against "normal"
NPCs. My guild spent about 8 hours in Dru's room in HS this last
weekend. I had (gut feel here, no tested numbers,) a 75% success rate
against the MOBs back there -- level 47-55.

Gaelthorne (just glad to be out of 54...)
Xaegony
